channel.title: RootMe on Classroom
channel.description: Recent content in RootMe on Classroom

item.title: TryHackMe RootMe
item.description: RootMe Task 01: Deploy the Room Task 02: Reconnaissance 2.1 Scan the machine, how many ports are open? run the command: nmap -sC -sV -oN nmap MACHINE_IP 2.2 What version of Apache is running? Ans is in task 2.1 output result. use cat nmap to see the output file. 2.3 Find directories on the web server using the GoBuster tool. gobuster dir -u 10.10.71.82 -w /usr/share/wordlists/dirbuster/directory-list-2.3-medium.txt 2.4 What is the hidden directory?
